languages.text: {n}Из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} Паскаля раздается статический шум, похожий на вздох.{/n} "Функции Оптикона-22 выражаются на плотьязе как... дипломатическое представительство флота, обеспечение поставок, сбор данных о звездных системах и наблюдение за тем, чтобы миряне не вторгались в зону интересов Эксплораторов".

{n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest, and collecting data on star systems."
languages.original_text: {n}Из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} Паскаля раздается статический шум, похожий на вздох.{/n} "Функции Оптикона-22 выражаются на плотьязе как... дипломатическое представительство флота, обеспечение поставок, сбор данных о звездных системах и наблюдение за тем, чтобы миряне не вторгались в зону интересов Эксплораторов".

traits.locale_text: {n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest, and collecting data on star systems."

{n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's vox.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... representing the Fleet on a diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, and ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

{n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest, and collecting data on star systems."

{n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's vox.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, and ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest."

{n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest, and collecting data on star systems."

{n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest, and collecting data on star systems."

languages.text: {n}パスカルの{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}からため息に似た機械音が発せられた。{/n}「オプティコン-22の機能をより明快な言葉で表すならば…艦隊の外交使節団として機能し、積荷を監督し、信徒が探索艦隊の関心領域を侵さないようにし、星系に関するデータを収集する、と表現できるであろう」
languages.original_text: {n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest, and collecting data on star systems."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}からため息に似た機械音が発せられた。{/n}「オプティコン-22の機能をより明快な言葉で表すならば…艦隊の外交使節団として機能し、積荷を監督し、信徒が探索艦隊の関心領域を侵さないようにし、星系に関するデータを収集する、と表現できるであろう」

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵装置{/g}发出了类似叹息的静电嘶嘶声。{/n}“奥普蒂孔22号的功能，用肉体语言可以概述为……负责执行舰队的外交工作，监督运输，防止教外人士入侵开拓者的利益范围，以及收集恒星系统的相关数据。”
languages.original_text: {n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest, and collecting data on star systems."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵装置{/g}发出了类似叹息的静电嘶嘶声。{/n}“奥普蒂孔22号的功能，用肉体语言可以概述为……负责执行舰队的外交工作，监督运输，防止教外人士入侵开拓者的利益范围，以及收集恒星系统的相关数据。”

languages.text: {n}Una leve interferencia parecida a un suspiro sale del {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} de Pasqal.{/n} «Las funciones de Opticon-22 pueden expresarse en idioma cárnico, así como... me ocupo de la misión diplomática de la Flota, superviso los envíos, me aseguro de que los laicos no invadan la esfera de interés de los exploradores y recabo información sobre sistemas estelares».
languages.original_text: {n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest, and collecting data on star systems."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una leve interferencia parecida a un suspiro sale del {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} de Pasqal.{/n} «Las funciones de Opticon-22 pueden expresarse en idioma cárnico, así como... me ocupo de la misión diplomática de la Flota, superviso los envíos, me aseguro de que los laicos no invadan la esfera de interés de los exploradores y recabo información sobre sistemas estelares».

languages.text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} de Pasqal émet un sifflement d'interférences proche du soupir.{/n} « En langage humain, les fonctions d'Opticon-22 seraient de... réaliser les objectifs diplomatiques de la flotte, superviser les livraisons, veiller à ce que les profanes n'empiètent pas sur la sphère d'intérêt des Explorators, et réunir des données sur les systèmes stellaires. »
languages.original_text: {n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest, and collecting data on star systems."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} de Pasqal émet un sifflement d'interférences proche du soupir.{/n} « En langage humain, les fonctions d'Opticon-22 seraient de... réaliser les objectifs diplomatiques de la flotte, superviser les livraisons, veiller à ce que les profanes n'empiètent pas sur la sphère d'intérêt des Explorators, et réunir des données sur les systèmes stellaires. »

languages.text: {n}Aus Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} ertönt ein zischendes Rauschen, das an ein Seufzen erinnert.{/n} "Die Funktionen von Opticon-22 bedeuten in Fleischsprech ... diplomatische Vertretung der Flotte, Überwachung der Lieferungen, Abschottung der Interessen der Exploratoren vor dem Laienstand und Sammlung von Daten über Sonnensysteme."
languages.original_text: {n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest, and collecting data on star systems."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} ertönt ein zischendes Rauschen, das an ein Seufzen erinnert.{/n} "Die Funktionen von Opticon-22 bedeuten in Fleischsprech ... diplomatische Vertretung der Flotte, Überwachung der Lieferungen, Abschottung der Interessen der Exploratoren vor dem Laienstand und Sammlung von Daten über Sonnensysteme."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksundan{/g} iç çekmeye benzer bir cızırtı yükseliyor.{/n} "Opticon-22'nin işlevleri beşer dilinde şöyle ifade edilebilir: Filo'nun diplomatik temsilciliğini yapmak, sevkiyatların teftişini sağlamak, ruhban dışı sınıfın Keşiftör nüfuz alanını ihlal etmediğinden emin olmak ve yıldız sistemlerine dair veri toplamak."
languages.original_text: {n}A hiss of static resembling a sigh comes out of Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Opticon-22's functions can be conveyed through flesh-speak as... functioning as the Fleet's diplomatic mission, overseeing shipments, ensuring that the laity does not encroach upon the Explorators' sphere of interest, and collecting data on star systems."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksundan{/g} iç çekmeye benzer bir cızırtı yükseliyor.{/n} "Opticon-22'nin işlevleri beşer dilinde şöyle ifade edilebilir: Filo'nun diplomatik temsilciliğini yapmak, sevkiyatların kontrolünü sağlamak, kâfirlerin Keşiftör ilgi alanını taciz etmediğinden emin olmak ve yıldız sistemlerine dair veri toplamak."
